title: 7/7/22 ADN EVENING NEWS LINEUP
cleaned_text:
staying well informed is more important than ever.

Who do you trust?

What can you believe?

Where will you turn for news?

With more & more fake news, sensational click bait headlines & propaganda articles clouding the truth; using biased & unreliable sources to stay informed can lead to radical views & often closed minded political beliefs.

If you don’t challenge those opinionated sources, you will end up distrusting legitimate facts & verified information. ADN provides accurate & verified sources including articles pertinent to yesterday, today and tomorrow.

Emergency crews responded to a pipeline explosion just west of Orchard in west Fort Bend County late Thursday morning, according to the Precinct 1 Constable’s Office.

The flames from the explosion appear to be out.
